org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.serializer

Class XmlPersistenceSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.serializer.PersistenceSerializer
      • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.serializer.XmlPersistenceSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializer

    public class XmlPersistenceSerializer
extends PersistenceSerializer
    Serializes objects into XML and deserializes XML back into objects using the FreezeDry framework's XmlPersistence engine.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XmlPersistenceSerializer()
      Constructs an object serializer that uses the FreezeDry persistence framework to serialize the objects into and out of XML
